chat.title: neurogenic shock, imaging
chat.message:
- ?add MAP targets and preferred vasoactive agent (norepi)
- imaging (CT/MRI) unless this would fall under the main trauma orders

chat.title: Communication orders
chat.message: Perhaps we could just have a single communication order for the patient's chart that alerts: SPINAL PRECAUTIONS whenever any health provider options the encounter (i.e. includes RN and PT/OT). Seems to be redundant to have it 3 times...
